data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Braasch, Dietrich, Boonsoong, Boonsatien (2009): A new Notacanthurus Tshernova, 1974 and a new Rhithrogena Eaton, 1881 (subgenus Tumungula Zhou & Peters, 2004) from Thailand (Heptageniidae, Ephemeroptera). Zootaxa 2166: 33-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.189084
